name: Killer Custard Honeydew (CLONE)
description:
Hi all,
I'm a big fan of "Vapetasia Killer Custard" and with @folkart's great work, I saved a lot of money. 
After trying the original honeydew version, a lot of things were clear to me - a bit sweeter and definitely TPA Honeydew.

I didn't do much, the whole praise goes to @folkart.
author: Untitled

reviews.text: Just had to give this a quick mix I suppose this is one of those recipes with low percentage of flavorings that actually taste big...did have to sub  Hs Italian cream for La cream cheese Icing for the time being on the shake this taste promising.
